Field Documentation

struct adaptive_timeout ldlm_ns_bucket::nsb_at_estimate [read]

Estimated lock callback time.

Used by adaptive timeout code to avoid spurious client evictions due to unresponsiveness when in fact the network or overall system load is at fault
